entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind south 30 km/h. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early in the evening. Flurries beginning in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 8 April 2023
